metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20969 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
do_ed_script in pch.c in GNU patch through 2.7.6 does not block strings beginning with a ! character. NOTE: this is the same commit as for CVE-2019-13638, but the ! syntax is specific to ed, and is unrelated to a shell metacharacter.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-20969` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

patch - 2.7.6-2ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: patch package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.7.6-2ubuntu1.1').
